item.title: The majority of streetlights are not working and the tunnel is very dark, 20th November
item.description:
The Bermondsey St Tunnel (between Crucifix Lane and Holyrood St) has 31 lights. As of 20 November 2025, 21 of these lights are not working - that is over two-thirds of the lights. The tunnel is now very dark in some areas and it is difficult to see hazards on the footpath such as puddles or piles of dog poo. Please would you carry out the necessary work to improve the lighting in the tunnel. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bermondsey Street, The Borough, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row

item.title: Between 26 - 28 Mayplace Avenue flooded, 20th November
item.description:

item.title: Unstable road surface, 20th November
item.description:
Sometime ago Parkside Avenue was resurfaced. Outside numbers 72 - 74 there is a ridge and holes appearing which are increasing in size. When HGVs and Buses go over this area the noise is horrendous this also makes me and my wife jump along with rattling my internal doors and it is only getting worse. I have attached photos of this issue and something needs to be done before a HGV or bus cause the road to collapse and a massive hole appear. Alternatively, stop HGVs traveling up the road as its clearly not suitable for them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parkside Avenue, Barnehurst, Bexleyheath, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet
